name: twistcli-scan

author: Twistlock (created by Mario Weigel)

inputs.name: scanType
inputs.label: Scan type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of twistcli scan: container images or serverless functions

inputs.name: twistlockService
inputs.label: Twistlock service/server end point

inputs.name: artifact
inputs.label: Image/Function zip
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the container image to scan or filename of the serverless functions zip file

inputs.name: httpProxy
inputs.label: Http Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The http proxy to be used by twistcli
